item.title: By: garypiggold
item.dc:creator: garypiggold
item.description: <p><img width="240" height="86" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.flickr.com/41/110997935_44111214c7_m.jpg" /></p><p>Hey there, Scott !!</p><p>and Don't Forget that most harmonious "Nick and Dave sing The Everly Brothers" EP which was lovingly tucked inside the original 12-inch <em>Seconds Of Pleasure</em></p><p>....not to mention the One and Only <a target="_self" href="https://www.mark-johnson.com/page14.html"><strong>Mark Johnson</strong></a></p><p>who wrote the greatest Edmunds song EVER (imho)..... </p>
item.content:encoded:
Hey there, Scott !!

and Don’t Forget that most harmonious "Nick and Dave sing The Everly Brothers" EP which was lovingly tucked inside the original 12-inch Seconds Of Pleasure

….not to mention the One and Only Mark Johnson

who wrote the greatest Edmunds song EVER (imho)…..
